title: Be an Interview Engineer
text: Interview Engineer Become a Karat Interview Engineer Conduct technical interviews for the world’s leading companies — all on your schedule See open roles Steps of Interview Engineers Interview Engineers must complete an onboarding program Step One With the guidance of a mentor, new IVEs master the Karat code of content Step Two IVEs practice delivering interviews and “get interview ready” Step Three IVEs conduct interviews with early career candidates while refining skills Step Four IVEs master a library of questions and conduct advanced interviews IVE Community Be a part of a global community Community is a big part of the IVE experience. It’s fostered by a strong, active and inclusive community like no other, and fueled by pride in a mission that matters. Become an IVE Current openings Are you ready to become an Interview Engineer? Select your region below to get started.
